data.message:
Hi My friend can not get access to her account because someone has changed her password and e-mail and mobile number on her profile !!!!
What to do?????

replies.message: Hi, Gunn, if your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section to get immediate help. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2buVEjk. -Ali

Facebook I asked you you change my Daughter date of birth and you delete it instead." be careful on your comment because your tell me what rights i have with Daughter or my family. I me David the DAD that's is under god him self has the final say!" I supervise my kids on my computer, if there on it ,i am beside them because there no way can get on it with out me i have it set up that way .The average Ages of consent 16 and up so that case winning age discrimination!!!.So please reactivate her account thank you so much the Father a.k.a THE DAD, David VanTassel of Isabelle Vantassel
Ook bij mij werd dit al 3X gedaan, maar krijg van FB geen antwoord.
